Superman is born Kal-El on the alien plannet Krypton. His parrents Jor-el and Lara become aware of Kryptons impending destruction and Jor-El begins constructing a spacecraft that would carry Kal-El to earth. During Kryptons last month Jor-El places young Kal-El in the spacecraft and launches it. Jor-El and Lara die as the spacecraft barely escape Kryptons fate. The explosion transforms planetary debres into Kryptonite, which is a radioactive substance that is lethal to superpowerd Kryptonians.
